channel.title: Los Angeles California on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Los Angeles California on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Sayre Fire, Los Angeles
item.description: Hot on the heels of the Tea Fire comes word of another big fire in Los Angeles, the Sayre Fire. Here's the news sources I was able to round up quickly; no doubt this will be changing fast. LAFD suggests these social media tags and channels: Twitter hashtag: #LAFIRE Flickr tags: "SayreFire" and "LAFD" and add to LAFD Photo Pool YouTube tags: "SayreFire" and "LAFD" Los Angeles Fire Department: Fire update 6am Sat PST; Fire evacuation map; Los Angeles DWP: Major power lines taken out of service Blog: LAist - power shut off by DWP;  freeway closure map; Newspaper: LA Times - overview with map and videos Television: KABC 7 live video Radio: KNX 1070 CBS news radio Hospital: Olive View Hospital in path of fire (LA Times) Metrolink: Antelope Valley Saturday service cancelled Twitter: following LAist, Metrolink, LAFD I'm particularly looking for news about Reseda (family in the area).
